about_the_game:
Oh no!!
Your sweet and caring grandmama has been kidnapped by the villain "Heimgartner" and his group of thugs! It falls upon your shoulders, as the young excitable golem "Linden", to go in pursuit and brave a plethora of labyrinthian dungeons to set things right again!

- How can a golem have a grandmother?
- Who is this villain doing such terrible things?
- And what is the story with the quirky floating skull following you around, called "Murray"?

All will be revealed in time.

Now come and discover this brand new world of secrets and adventure!

Features

  • Classic Zelda-like gameplay with fresh surprises
  • A big assortment of large and varied dungeons
  • Secrets hidden everywhere
  • Murray!! (You'll all love him, or so he keeps confidently proclaiming)
  • Modern conveniences like auto-saves and button remapping
  • And a lot of love and passion put into the art and animations


You can also find the game here on Kickstarter (coming early 2024):
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/hornofbalance/horn-of-balance?ref=discovery
